name: openbao
description: OpenBao is a community-driven fork of HashiCorp Vault designed for secure secret management. It supports encryption, key management, access control, and API-driven workflows in self-hosted environments.
features: Secret Management: Store and manage sensitive data like passwords, API keys, and certificates with encryption at rest.
Dynamic Secrets: Generate temporary credentials for databases, cloud services, and applications with automatic rotation.
Access Control: Implement fine-grained policies and role-based access control for secure secret distribution.
Encryption Services: Provide encryption-as-a-service for applications without exposing encryption keys to clients.
Authentication Methods: Support multiple authentication backends including LDAP, OAuth, and certificate-based auth.
Audit Logging: Maintain detailed logs of all secret access and operations for compliance and security monitoring.
High Availability: Deploy in clustered configurations with automatic failover and data replication capabilities.
API Integration: Access all functionality through comprehensive REST APIs for automation and application integration.
Key Management: Generate, rotate, and manage cryptographic keys with hardware security module support.
Transit Encryption: Encrypt data in transit without storing it, providing cryptographic services to applications.
Identity Management: Manage identities across different systems and automatically assign appropriate permissions.
Plugin Architecture: Extend functionality with custom plugins for specialized secret engines and authentication methods.
